short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send a page to the inbox of Follow to read and subscribe later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üåü Features

This extension:
1. helps transforming a page into readable content
2. will load your Follow account's inbox list
3. helps sending the readable content to a inbox with 1-CLICK

üß≠ Changelog

You can find the full changelog at https://github.com/xc2/follow-it-later/releases

üîê Trustable

- This extension is open source on GitHub
- All releases are built on GitHub with verifiable provenance
- The web store versions are identical in content to the GitHub releases.
